name: DEEP (Pavelioso)
description:
[If you stumble across this project, don't download yet. I am working on the inner systems, the gameplay loop is still not there, or neither is the content. I have this to pretty much track my progress. Thanks!]

Premise
All the ice caps have melted, and new trade routes opened in the arctic. Scavange loot, keep out of warfare you cannot win, and discover the hidden secrets the ocean floor holds.
DEEP is a project, set above the artic ocean, where player scavenges either on land, surface of the ocean, or while he dives deep on the ocean floor, where all the best loot is. Player has to defend his ship, upgrade and repair, fight off pirates, corporations, or do jobs for them. Either way, exploration is key!
